DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date on which the medical history was collected represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the date the medical history was collected?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: This should be a complete date. The date of collection may be determined from a collected visit date.

ReferenceDocuments.name: MHDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable MHDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: This should be a complete date. The date of collection may be determined from a collected visit date.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 2179659 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.

What was the date the medical history was collected?
